TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Connie_Mack_Berry, title = Connie_Mack_Berry, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connie_Mack_Berry} }

S.FORM: Connie Mack Berry sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1915, byacing te 4 ru 15 ryax qu hintgan nya (mhuqil sa kawas tay 1980), kinhulan nya ga South Carolina, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 191 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 98 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. 1936-1938 kawas Berry mzyu mari qsahuy maki pakalolaynacoli kruhu' pqwasan biru.Berry na take mari maki NCSU. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Connie Mack Berry sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas te 1915, byacing te 4 ro 15 ryax qo hintgan nya (mhoqil sa kawas tay 1980), kinholan nya ga Sooth Carolina, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 191 konbon kinwagiq nya, 98 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. 1936-1938 kawas Berry mzyo mari qsahoy maki pakalolaynacoli kroho' pqwasan biro.Berry na take mari maki NCSU. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
